text: Mpe soki totiaka kurani oyo na lokota mosusu (ya arabo te), balingaki koloba ete: Mpona nini balimboli mikapo na yango polele te? Nini? Kurani na lokota ya bapaya (motindami) arabo? Loba: Yango ezali bokambi mpe libiki mpona bandimi, kasi baye bandimi te matoyi na bango makangami mpe miso na bango mazipami. Bango wana nde bakobengama Ð¾ esika ya mosika
